name: Beast Smash
description:
Battle giant monsters and huge bosses, traveling through the mountains in your quest to capture the evil farmer! The FREE side-scrolling platform game for you!

FEATURES:
✓ Awesome Graphics: Pre-rendered 3D smooth animations, candy for your eyes!
✓ Challenging Bosses: Including bosses every few levels with different behaviors to prove your skills.
✓ Medals: Get the gold medal collecting all the coins in a level. A harder challenge for hardcore gamers!
✓ Unlockables: Use the coins you collected across the levels to unlock new features. (doesn't require real money)
✓ Badges: Discover awesome badges that measure your gaming skills.
✓ Multiple Control Types: Play with a keyboard, virtual buttons in touchscreen or, if the screen is small, tilt your device to control the main character.
✓ Controllers Users: Select the Keyboard Only Control Type from the Options Menu.
✓ Original Story: Discover the whole story in-game.
✓ Multi-language: The entire game translated to multiple languages.
✓ ...and more!

Problems? Questions? Bugs? You have a contact button in-game (in the about sub-menu). Tap it to send us an email.

Have fun!
